Inventions & Discoveries.name: Inventions & Discoveries Quiz 33
Inventions & Discoveries.description: This is a quiz about Inventions & Discoveries.

questions.text: What was the name of the first ship to sail around the world?
What was the name of the first nuclear-powered submarine?
Modern computer microchips are primarily composed of what element?
In 1909, Frederick Cook claimed to be the first explorer to reach what location?
The first commercial radio station was located in what city?

Inventions & Discoveries.name: Inventions & Discoveries Quiz 66
Inventions & Discoveries.description: This is a quiz about Inventions & Discoveries.

questions.text: Ada Lovelace is credited with being the first person to have made what?
The first sound recording to be made and reproduced was a recitation of what nursery rhyme?
What is the name of the Newtonian law that states 'An object in Motion tends to stay in motion'?
